Guide  
[Simulation-Based Forest Plots with NMsim](NMsim-intro.html) is the place to start. It contains basic information to get you started and demonstrates the most common types of simulations.

Secondly, you can let your interests guide your next topic. With variability, currently most up to date is [NMsim - Simulation-Based Forest Plots with NMsim](NMsim-forest.html)
